name: VR Space Roller Coaster 2017: Space Visit 3d
name_original: VR Space Roller Coaster 2017: Space Visit 3d
description:
Let’s get ready to find your step into a show of crazy kid who is ready to explore space journey with extreme crazy vr roller coaster. Let’s you’re your pocket glasses and get a real navigation of virtual reality with amazing views of sky roller coaster and get addiction of real roller coaster rush.
VR space roller coaster is a free game which allows you to ride with multiple modes. So jump into trolley and ride your roller skate either with free vr riding mode or enjoy your furious journey with exciting views of space by selecting vr level riding mode.
Features:
360 degree rotation.
Extreme crazy journey with virtual reality.
Enjoy crazy rides with multiple modes.
Endless space trip.
